title: Searching a champ
body: A champ wich is very mobile. Maybe portals or a tp. Thx for support

replies.body:
Mobile champs with aggressive gameplay:
{{champion:103}} {{champion:84}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:114}} {{champion:150}} {{champion:120}} {{champion:39}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:7}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:236}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:133}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:67}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:238}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:157}} 

Champions with a tp:
{{champion:245}} {{champion:38}} {{champion:55}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:238}} 


I recommend for low lvl:
{{champion:105}}  safe, easy to hit Abalities, massive dmg
{{champion:120}} massive dmg with Trinity, easy engage/disengage ult, after trinity you can go tank and you still deal alot of dmg
{{champion:39}}  easy farming, 1v1 god, good sustain
{{champion:7}} "easy" one shot combo (some training with the chain is required), very mobile/safe, good roaming potential, very strong early
{{champion:236}} imo strongest adc in early game, low cd dash, easy farming
{{champion:58}} imo strongest early game top, very easy farming, massvie dmg in early states of the game, complete lane domination, massive sustain, no Mana
{{champion:254}} fast Jungle clear, very effective early ganks, massive basic dmg, point and click gapcloser/cc ulti
{{champion:238}} "easy" one shot combo (again some training required), easy farm, very safe (unless you use your Shadows aggressively), no Mana
{{champion:245}} very safe, nice aoe stun, massive dmg, easy farm


I don't recommond for low lvl:
{{champion:114}} once you're in the fight you won't get out again, need to time your e, when you fail your ult you're pretty useless in teamfights,
{{champion:84}} you need to know how to properly use your w to get out of the fight, you need good target selection
{{champion:150}} very predictable, weak in mini form, you need to time your Ult perfectly or you will be useless
{{champion:76}} you have to hit long range spears to be effective, 
{{champion:133}} you have to know how you roam properly, no disengage
{{champion:67}} have never seen a good low lvl Vayne, you have to know how you time your stealth properly so you dont get into focus, hit your e stun
{{champion:131}} once you're in you won't get out again, you have to land your q on the right target before you ult in (or you will waste your full combo against a tank)
Omg never thoight i would get so much support thanks a lot i gonna read it when i have lunchüéâüëçüòÉüòÄ
I allready have him. Portal and tp?

Which lane do you prefer ? Which playstyle do you prefer ? Do you want to use it in ranked or normal ? Are you a beginner or do you have a lot of experience in LoL ? We need more information !
That is the same question as you ask us what meal is tasty :3
Lane doesnt matter solo queue and agressiv playstile im lv 18 and not bad at playing
